The economic reports today outpace the projections. America‚Äôs economy is roaring back!

I'm continuing to fight for the deployment of #ruralbroadband, reopening our communities safely and responsibly, and protecting our economy from #China.

Those suffering from #PTSD and other mental illnesses deserve to have these tools. https://t.co/Wdw0QJd5Vb

245 officers have been injured. Mobs have attacked with weapons for 60 straight nights. 

Nothing about this is "peaceful protesting." Order must be restored NOW!

Activist judges blocked safety standards for women having chemical abortions. 

These dangerous drugs can now be sent by mail, without the need to go to a healthcare facility. This puts mothers at an extraordinary risk of death.

AG Barr, we must appeal ACOG v FDA. #ProLife

Fantastic idea, @AjitPaiFCC. Huge impact for our veterans in particular.

Our response is working. Let's keep the momentum going. https://t.co/5TKOg9zjWz

Thank you for your leadership @realDonaldTrump üá∫üá∏

The #PaycheckProtectionProgram is a crucial element of our response to the #coronavirus. 

As small business owners, my husband and I know the financial uncertainty as we face this threat, so we took action to ensure our employees remained on the payroll:
https://t.co/vvIqShlwPv

‚Üí Truck drivers who deliver our goods.

I‚Äôm heading back to Washington to support American workers and health care professionals with tomorrow‚Äôs funding bill to replenish the #PaycheckProtectionProgram and put more money towards our hospitals.

Our farmers and ranchers are the very folks who help feed our country. #InItTogether https://t.co/aqzClscx2F

#China must be held accountable for their lies and cover-up regarding #coronavirus. Their deceit has killed Americans and around the world, crippling our economy.

We MUST work to reduce our dependency on China, ESPECIALLY for our pharmaceuticals and basic medical equipment.

Canada passed the #USMCA, bringing the agreement one step closer to full implementation. This transcontinental agreement will do so much for American farmers, ranchers, and consumers.

I voted YES on H.R. 6201, the Families First Coronavirus Response Act.

This package includes free testing for symptomatic patients, paid sick leave for small business employees, and funds to bolster unemployment insurance programs. 

I'm glad we finally got this done.
